description:
When one speaker isn't enough for you, in September we'll offer from the local scrum community, 5 people all giving lightning talks of 10-15mins each. This is a great way to get to hear about the varying ways the Scrum is being used and the fun people are having. This event is limited to 40 people, book on now to avoid disappointment.

 

Confirmed Speakers

Thom Leggett - Visualisation Paul Goddard - Improvisation Tom Howlett - Promiscuous Collaboration in Agile Andrew Davies - Shared Vision Simon Deeley - Scrum v ISO9001  

 

Special thanks to True Clarity for assisting in arranging the venue for this event.
title: Lightning Talks
